page.title: 14MY HOUSE
page.content: I live in{Netley Road}in{Newton Abbot and I really do like it. It is a medium size{terraced house}and it is quite old. It has three bedrooms a kitchen, lounge, dining room, utility room, one big hall and an extension. The{garden}is small but just the right size we also have a{patio}where we have deck chairs and a small table we put a{garden shed}in about two years ago and now, the cat sleeps in it. My room is quite big and I have a sink in my bedroom. All{three bedrooms}are up stairs. The{extension}was built about two or three years ago and that is now the{bathroom.}In our attic there are birds nesting and they make a real racket. We do not have a garage, we park our{Cortina 2.3 Ghia,}which is really good, outside the house.
